title: Just Misunderstood
content:
[[>]]
[[module Rate]]
[[/>]]

> Good evening.
> 
> If you're reading this, we've taken notice of your concern and/or sympathy for [https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/scp-3467-j a certain infamous member] of the custodial staff. 
> 
> I don't mean to imply that such sentiment isn't commendable; quite the opposite. Nor am I at liberty to justify why he must face such abuse. That information is above your clearance level.
> 
> Here's what little I am able to tell you:
> 
>> 1. Hank doesn't usually mind.
>> 2. If he does, it's his own fault.
>> 3. Though he's no threat to anyone now, he has a history of //extremely// questionable deeds and remains unrepentant.
> 
> If it's not in you to go out and bully someone, then don't. You have no obligation to that effect. But for God's sake, "leave Hank alone" is not the hill you want to die on.
> 
> [https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/local--files/just-misunderstood/j-m.html Let it go. That's an order.]
> 
> Regards,
> Agatha Sykes, Department of Other
